alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 6:30PM CDT until June 05 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ellis County in central Kansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located very near Emmeram, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Walker around 645 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
